instruction: Patient experienced transient dizziness during the first couple of weeks of therapy, which has now resolved. Patient reports difficulty maintaining consistent dosing times due to unpredictable work schedule; currently uses phone alarms but occasionally ignores them.

attributes.narrative: Patient experienced transient dizziness during the first couple of weeks of therapy that has since resolved. Patient reports difficulty maintaining consistent dosing times due to an unpredictable work schedule; they set phone alarms but occasionally ignore them.

instruction: Clinician advised the patient to adopt a backup medication-reminder strategy, such as using a pill organizer or another more attention-grabbing reminder method, to improve dose adherence given the patient’s variable work schedule.

coding.display: Education about use of pill box

attributes.comment: Adopt a backup medication-reminder strategy—such as using a pill organizer or another more attention-grabbing reminder method—to improve dose adherence given the patient’s variable work schedule.
